channel.title: Lithuania Pk! Need development team! I have failed in other post. Sorry
channel.description:
[ul][list][list]Hello guys, i have edited Hybrid pvp source and client v3 to my own server Lithuania Pk. It have a lot of bosses, minigames and more!!! So, here we are. The minigames: -Barrow minigame! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=KopijaiBarrowminigame.jpg -Pest control! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dpestcontrol.jpg -Gzhaar cave! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ28QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DJad.jpg -Duel arena! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DDuelarena.jpg A lot of bosses: -Godwars! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dgodwars.jpg -King black dragon! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DkBD.jpg -Dagannoth kings! Haven’t got picture  -Tormented demons! urrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DTormenteddemons.jpg -Corporal beast! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dcorporalbeast.jpg Newest Pk armor! -Vesta! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=Vesta.jpg -Zuriel! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DZuriel.jpg -Morigan! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DMorigan.jpg -Statius! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DStatius.jpg -Primal! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DPrimal.jpg -Torva! urrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DTorva.jpg -Elite black! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DEliteblack.jpg Full working ags spec! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DKopijaiagsspec.jpg Zgs spec! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg Bgs spec! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dbgsspec.jpg Sgs spec! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DSgsspec.jpg Dragon claws spec! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DDragonclawsspec.jpg Statius hammer spec! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DStatiusHammerspec.jpg Vls spec! urrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DVlsspec.jpg And more like chaotic! Chaotic rapier! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dchaoticrapier.jpg Chaotic maul! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dchaoticmaul.jpg Chaotic longsword! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dchaoticlongsword.jpg Working turmoil! urrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dturmoil.jpg Working taste vengeance! urrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DTaste.jpg Working soul split too! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DSoulsplit.jpg Easy training at rock crabs! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Drockcrabs.jpg Added new shop! QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dpkstore-1.jpg
So this is my server, little changed from hybrid scape v3 but I have added a few new commands for better game . I think you liked it, if oyu want to join my development team fill in information in here: [center]Server Sided Coders [/list][/list][/ul]
Code: [Select] Name: Age: Why do you want this job: How much time will you be working: Will you follow the rules: Any Experience: How well can you code java: MSN (Optional): Skype (Optional):
Client Sided Coders Code: [Select] Client Coder Name: Age: Why do you want this job: How much time will you be Working: Will you follow the rules: Any Experience: Can you add Custom Buttons: Are you good with Interfaces? MSN (Optional): Skype (Optional): Hoster Code: [Select] Name: Age: How Many hours can you Host: Have you hosted a server before: GFX Artist Code: [Select] Name: Age: Experience: Programs you use: show some work:[/center]

item.title: Lithuania Pk! Need development team! I have failed in other post. Sorry
item.dc:creator: @L0n3x L0n3x
item.description:
@L0n3x wrote:

[ul][list][list]Hello guys, i have edited Hybrid pvp source and client v3 to my own server Lithuania Pk.
It have a lot of bosses, minigames and more!!!
So, here we are. The minigames:
-Barrow minigame!

-Pest control!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dpestcontrol.jpg
-Gzhaar cave!
http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ28QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DJad.jpg
-Duel arena!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DDuelarena.jpg
A lot of bosses:
-Godwars!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dgodwars.jpg
-King black dragon!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DkBD.jpg
-Dagannoth kings!
Haven’t got picture 
-Tormented demons!
urrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DTormenteddemons.jpg
-Corporal beast!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dcorporalbeast.jpg
Newest Pk armor!
-Vesta!
http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=Vesta.jpg
-Zuriel!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DZuriel.jpg
-Morigan!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DMorigan.jpg
-Statius!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DStatius.jpg
-Primal!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DPrimal.jpg
-Torva!
urrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DTorva.jpg
-Elite black!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DEliteblack.jpg
Full working ags spec!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DKopijaiagsspec.jpg
Zgs spec!
http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg
Bgs spec!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dbgsspec.jpg
Sgs spec!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DSgsspec.jpg
Dragon claws spec!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DDragonclawsspec.jpg
Statius hammer spec!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DStatiusHammerspec.jpg
Vls spec!
urrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DVlsspec.jpg
And more like chaotic!
Chaotic rapier!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dchaoticrapier.jpg
Chaotic maul!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dchaoticmaul.jpg
Chaotic longsword!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dchaoticlongsword.jpg
Working turmoil!
urrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dturmoil.jpg
Working taste vengeance!
urrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DTaste.jpg
Working soul split too!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DSoulsplit.jpg
Easy training at rock crabs!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Drockcrabs.jpg
Added new shop!
QcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dpkstore-1.jpg

So this is my server, little changed from hybrid scape v3 but I have added a few new commands for better game . I think you liked it, if oyu want to join my development team fill in information in here:
[center]Server Sided Coders
[/list][/list][/ul]
